name: The General: Warfare in the Napoleonic Era
overview: The General is turn-based strategy set in the era of the Napoleonic Wars. A player is general of the armed forces of a small European state. He controls 3 types of units (artillery, cavalry, and infantry) and must defeat enemy's army. Orders for the troops are entered from the keyboard, in appropriate order: 1 Type of unit 2 Unit's number 3 Type of command, as a movement, or a shot. Commands are executed at the end of the turn. Field of view is very limited - player's telescope is required to see the opponent's actions.
